snippet: Major League Soccer’s leading scorer, Thierry Henry of the Red Bulls, will miss up to four weeks with a strained right hamstring.
abstract: New York Red Bulls striker Thierry Henry will miss up to four weeks because of hamstring injury.
lead_paragraph: Major League Soccer’s leading scorer, Thierry Henry of the Red Bulls, will miss up to four weeks with a strained right hamstring.

headline.seo: Thierry Henry to Miss Four Weeks
